document.full_text: syrian security forces have released 300 people detained in the coastal city of banias and restored basic services, a rights group said, within hours of the government saying the threat from protests was receding.
document.title: syrian forces relax grip on town of banias
lines_and_colors: syrian security forces have released 300 people detained in the coastal city of banias and restored basic services, a rights group said, within hours of the government saying the threat from protests was receding.
